'''''Gymnopilus medius''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the [[Cortinariaceae]] family.

==Phylogeny==
''Gymnopilus medius'' is in the Lepidotus-Subearlei grouping of the genus ''Gymnopilus''.<ref name=Guzman-Davalos2003>{{cite book |vauthors=Guzman-Davalos L, Mueller G, Cifuentes J, Miller AN, Santerre A |title=Traditional infrageneric classification of ''Gymnopilus'' is not supported by ribosomal DNA sequence data |journal=Mycologia  |year=2003 |pages=1204–14}}</ref>
